description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) to planning permission 222881FUL dated 09.09.2022 for 'Single storey rear extension; and external alteration to side elevation involving relocation, and replacement of existing doors'. Amendment seeks changes to rear extension roof from mono pitched roof to a dual pitch roof; side elevation door & window repositioned (in similar location); existing rear SVP to be modified to allow for new roof construction
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: A-101 P3 (site plan), A-101 P3 (existing ground floor), A-200 P3 (proposed ground floor), A-201 P3 (proposed elevations), A-202 P3 (sections), A-203 P3 (existing elevations), A-203 P3 (roof plan).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
